original: 《 天候 》　　華北、華中、華南戰場，有不同的氣候特徵。　　晴天、沙塵、起霧、下雨、下雪，　　影響 戰場上全體 移動速度、戰鬥能力；　　順風或逆風，影響弓弩飛行兵器的投射傷害。
text: "Weather" 　　 The battlefields in North China, Central China, and South China have different climatic characteristics.　　Sunny, sand, fog, rain, snow, 　　 affect the movement speed and combat ability of all people on the battlefield; 　　 tailwind or headwind, affect the projected damage of crossbow and crossbow weapons.
